name: Pansear

evolution.description: Pansear can evolve into Simisear at level 8 and above, with the help of a Fire Stone. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The High Temp Pokémon. This Pokémon lives in caves in volcanoes. The fire within the tuft on its head can reach 600° F.

abilities.name: Gluttony
abilities.description: This Pokémon must eat its held berry when it falls below ½ of its maximum HP.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.
